data.name: Overcraft
data.detailed_description:
Overcraft is a collectible card game. Earn Ink to craft cards and unlock Research. Collect all 150 cards.

Overcraft starts as a clicker game. The click value is increased on the Research screen. After "Automatic +Ink" is researched, clicking becomes optional.

No pay to win.

How to Play:
1. Click +Ink to collect a random amount of Ink.
2. Craft random cards for 500 Ink each.
3. There are 30 common (grey), 30 uncommon (green), 30 rare (blue), 30 very rare (purple) and 30 extremely rare (orange) cards to collect.
4. Spend Ink on Research to collect more Ink and unlock rarer cards.
5. Research Automatic +Ink to collect Ink over time while playing.
6. Exchange three duplicate cards of the same rarity to craft a specific card for 25,000 Ink.
7. After all cards of the same rarity are collected, recycle duplicate cards of that rarity for Ink.
8. Collect all 150 cards.

Nudity is censored by default (in case of streaming or at work). Go to settings and select "Uncensored Art" to show nudity.

data.short_description: Overcraft is a collectible card game. Earn Ink to craft cards and unlock Research. Collect all 150 cards.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains frequent images of nude adult women including in some instances erotic poses. Does not contain sex.

40% of the card art contains partial or covered nudity. 40% of the card art contains topless images that include breasts. 20% of the card art contains full nudity including uncensored genitals.
